EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] Airline Operators Webinar Series: APU Track
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for registering for Airline Operators Webinar Series - Auxiliary Power Unit Reliability and Technical Updates
To join the event, please log on to the webinar platform by clicking here <[[https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/2296049/C9DB2B5595AC8EB560438AE20C5CE3F0]]>, fifteen minutes before the event starts.
Date: April 29, 2020 Time: 1:00 p.m. GMT, 8:00 a.m. CT {{my.Add to Calendar}}
We look forward to meeting you online for this webinar.
Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
